thread.section_title: Orchard Street Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not a Bad Deal
thread.title_full: Not a Bad Deal - Review of Orchard Street Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: buzzknit
title: Not a Bad Deal
text:
This is a new, but small hotel When I say small, the rooms are very small. The hotel was clean and a great location for me. The staff was very nice and the room was clean and I had a nice view. For the price I paid it was more than worth it. Watch the prices on the hotel, while I had a great rate in January, the price is quite a bit higher when I head back to NYC in April. Note that the bedroom is just about all bed, it was tight to walk around the bed, but I didn't mind, I was comfortable and the bathroom was very nice.
Room Tip: Get a corner room for a great view and lots of light. See more room tips
